languages.text: {n}На исполнение приказа требуется немалое время. Наконец вокс оживает.{/n} "...Ваша Светлость, Артифекс-картограф утверждает, что нашел упоминание о ксеносах, схожих с теми, что встретились нам. В манускрипте они названы "некронами".

{n}An hours-long silence follows as your order is being executed. At last, the vox comes to life again.{/n} "...Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the Carto-Artifex claims to have found a mention of xenos similar to the ones we've encountered. The manuscript refers to them as 'Necrons.'"
languages.original_text: {n}На исполнение приказа требуется немалое время. Наконец вокс оживает.{/n} "...Ваша Светлость, Артифекс-картограф утверждает, что нашел упоминание о ксеносах, схожих с теми, что встретились нам. В манускрипте они названы "некронами".

traits.locale_text: {n}Executing the order takes a lot of time. At last vox comes to life.{/n} "... Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Carto-Artifex states that he has found mentioning of the xenos similar to those we encountered. The manuscript refers to them as ‘necrons'."

{n}Executing the order takes a lot of time. At last vox comes to life.{/n} "... Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Carto-Artifex states that he has found mentioning of the xenos similar to those we encountered. The manuscript refers to them as ‘necrons'."

{n}Executing the order takes a long time. At last, the vox comes to life.{/n} "...Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the Carto-Artifex is claiming to have found a mention of xenos similar to those we've encountered. The manuscript refers to them as ‘Necrons.'"

{n}Executing the order takes a long time. At last, the vox comes to life.{/n} "...Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the Carto-Artifex is claiming to have found a mention of xenos similar to those we've encountered. The manuscript refers to them as ‘Necrons.'"

{n}An hours-long silence follows as your order is being executed. At last, the vox comes to life again.{/n} "...Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the Carto-Artifex claims to have found a mention of xenos similar to the ones we've encountered. The manuscript refers to them as 'Necrons.'"

languages.text: {n}音阵大师传达了你的命令。经过长达几个小时的沉寂之后，音阵频道终于再次响了起来。{/n}“……大人，档案管理员声称找到了我们遇到的那些异形。根据档案记载，那些异形被称为‘太空死灵’。”
languages.original_text: {n}An hours-long silence follows as your order is being executed. At last, the vox comes to life again.{/n} "...Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the Carto-Artifex claims to have found a mention of xenos similar to the ones we've encountered. The manuscript refers to them as 'Necrons.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵大师传达了你的命令。经过长达几个小时的沉寂之后，音阵频道终于再次响了起来。{/n}“……大人，档案管理员声称找到了我们遇到的那些异形。根据档案记载，那些异形被称为‘太空死灵’。”

languages.text: {n}Le temps que votre ordre soit exécuté, le silence se prolonge plusieurs heures durant. Enfin, le vox s'anime à nouveau.{/n} « ... Votre Seigneurie, le carto-artifex affirme avoir trouvé une mention de xénos semblables à ceux que nous avons rencontrés. Le manuscrit les désigne sous le nom de "Nécrons". »
languages.original_text: {n}An hours-long silence follows as your order is being executed. At last, the vox comes to life again.{/n} "...Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the Carto-Artifex claims to have found a mention of xenos similar to the ones we've encountered. The manuscript refers to them as 'Necrons.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le temps que votre ordre soit exécuté, le silence se prolonge plusieurs heures durant. Enfin, le vox s'anime à nouveau.{/n} « ... Votre Seigneurie, le carto-artifex affirme avoir trouvé une mention de xénos semblables à ceux que nous avons rencontrés. Le manuscrit les désigne sous le nom de "Nécrons". »

languages.text: {n}Es folgt eine stundenlange Stille, während dein Befehl ausgeführt wird. Schließlich springt das Vox wieder an.{/n} "... Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, der Carto-Artifex glaubt, Erwähnungen von Xenos entdeckt zu haben, die denen ähneln, auf die wir gestoßen sind. Im Manuskript werden sie als 'Necrons' bezeichnet."
languages.original_text: {n}An hours-long silence follows as your order is being executed. At last, the vox comes to life again.{/n} "...Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the Carto-Artifex claims to have found a mention of xenos similar to the ones we've encountered. The manuscript refers to them as 'Necrons.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Es folgt eine stundenlange Stille, während dein Befehl ausgeführt wird. Schließlich springt das Vox wieder an.{/n} "... Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, der Carto-Artifex glaubt, Erwähnungen von Xenos entdeckt zu haben, die denen ähneln, auf die wir gestoßen sind. Im Manuskript werden sie als 'Necrons' bezeichnet."

languages.text: {n}Se produce un silencio de varias horas mientras se ejecutan tus órdenes. Finalmente, el voco vuelve a emitir sonido.{/n} «... {mf|Milord|Milady}, el cartoartífice asegura haber encontrado una mención a xenos similares a los que hemos visto. El manuscrito se refiere a ellos como "Necrones"».
languages.original_text: {n}An hours-long silence follows as your order is being executed. At last, the vox comes to life again.{/n} "...Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the Carto-Artifex claims to have found a mention of xenos similar to the ones we've encountered. The manuscript refers to them as 'Necrons.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Se produce un silencio de varias horas mientras se ejecutan tus órdenes. Finalmente, el voco vuelve a emitir sonido.{/n} «... {mf|Milord|Milady}, el cartoartífice asegura haber encontrado una mención a xenos similares a los que hemos visto. El manuscrito se refiere a ellos como "Necrones"».

languages.text: {n}命令の実行には何時間もかかる沈黙が続いた。ついにヴォクスが再び音を発する。{/n}「…陛下、カルト・アーティフェックスが、我々が遭遇したものに似た異種族に関する記述を見つけたと主張しています。その写本には『ネクロン』と記されています」
languages.original_text: {n}An hours-long silence follows as your order is being executed. At last, the vox comes to life again.{/n} "...Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the Carto-Artifex claims to have found a mention of xenos similar to the ones we've encountered. The manuscript refers to them as 'Necrons.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}命令の実行には何時間もかかる沈黙が続いた。ついにヴォクスが再び音を発する。{/n}「…陛下、カルト・アーティフェックスが、我々が遭遇したものに似た異種族に関する記述を見つけたと主張しています。その写本には『ネクロン』と記されています」

languages.text: {n}Emrin yerine getirilirken saatler süren sessizliğin ardından nihayet vokstan ses geliyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... Haritakâr, karşılaştığımız yaratıklara benzeyen zenolarla ilgili bilgilere rastlamış. El yazmalarında bunlardan 'Nekron' diye bahsediliyor."
languages.original_text: {n}An hours-long silence follows as your order is being executed. At last, the vox comes to life again.{/n} "...Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the Carto-Artifex claims to have found a mention of xenos similar to the ones we've encountered. The manuscript refers to them as 'Necrons.'"
